name: FriendFinder-
description: ------- ## Description ------ *Friend Finder* is an application that finds a matched friend though the users input from a 10 quetion survery. Each question has a value between 1(Stringly Disagree) to 5 (String Agree). Once the current user submits the survery, an existing array of user input is returned. The choice is made by finding the lowest absolute diffference for all 10 survery questions.
